reviewText: Absolutely love the Sunrise Citrus! It's so refreshing and fills my home with joy. The scent is perfectly balanced and not overpowering. A true morning delight!
Great zesty scent, very uplifting. The candle burns evenly. Wish the throw was a tiny bit stronger, but overall a fantastic product for my office.
Lavender Dreams is my go-to for relaxation. The chamomile and vanilla notes are so soothing. Burns beautifully and the scent lingers nicely. Highly recommend!
Vanilla Bean Bliss is pure comfort in a jar. The wooden wick has a lovely crackle. My whole family enjoys this scent, it's warm and inviting.
Mint Mojito is super refreshing! Perfect for summer. The mint is crisp and the lime is just right. It's a bit smaller than I expected but packs a punch.
A very pleasant lavender scent. Good for evenings. The packaging was also lovely, making it a great gift.
